PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Choose what to search on the phone

com.google.android.search.core.preferenc.android:title: Personal results
com.google.android.search.core.preferenc.android:summary: Personal results help find more relevant content for you, including content and connections that only you can see.

Preference.android:title: App Search Stats
Preference.android:summary: App Search Stats are used to improve app search and discovery.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: [DEBUG] Enable remote JS debugging
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Allow remote debugging inside the main WebView

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Contact recognition
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Let Google use and store your device contacts to understand who you're trying to reach."

Preference.android:title: Search engine storage
Preference.android:summary: Control storage used by the on-device search engine.

com.google.android.search.core.preferenc.android:title: Help improve Google
com.google.android.search.core.preferenc.android:summary: Send Google statistics about your interactions with Google Now Launcher

com.google.android.search.core.preferenc.android:summary: You can use Google Now to share updates with people you care about

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Bluetooth headset
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Records audio through Bluetooth headset if available.

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Makes personalization option visible in voice settings.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: [Debug] Log audio, grammar and hotwords
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Logs all microphone input, compiled grammars and hotwords.

Preference.android:summary: Sends all logged audio, grammar and hotwords by email.
